summary: This is a simple retexture mod that changes the default Septim coin into a British Sovereign.
descriptionHtml: This is a simple retexture mod that changes the default Septim coin into a British Sovereign. The Sovereign is made of solid gold, and was first minted in 1817. The Sovereign was originally worth one pound, but it is unlikely that anywhere would actually accept it as currency. Anyway, enjoy!
author: George1050
